title: US stocks plunge after bleak Chinese manufacturing report
text: Photo: Richard Drew, AP 8564534|article-6475932|7 8564534|article-6475932|1 email_share_embed|photo-8564534|article-6475932|1 8564534|article-6475932|2 8564534|article-6475932|3 8564534|article-6475932|4 8564534|article-6475932|5 google_share_embed|photo-8564534|article-6475932|6 Specialist Thomas Facchine, left, works on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange, Tuesday, Sept. 1, 2015. More signs of weakness in China's economy are sending global stock markets sharply lower. Specialist Thomas Facchine, left, works on the floor of the New... NEW YORK (AP) — Markets are turning turbulent again after investors were unnerved by more signs of weakness in China, the world's second-largest economy. Specialist Thomas Facchine, left, works on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange, Tuesday, Sept. 1, 2015. More signs of weakness in China's economy are sending global stock markets sharply lower. Specialist Thomas Facchine, left, works on the floor of the New... NEW YORK (AP) — Markets are turning turbulent again after investors were unnerved by more signs of weakness in China, the world's second-largest economy.
